Class BankAccount

java.lang.Object
BankAccount
public class BankAccount extends Object
Class representing a checking or savings account.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    accName
    The account's name.
    private int
    accNum
    The account number.
    private char
    accountType
    The account type: Checking (C) or Savings (S).
    private double
    balance
    The balance of the bank account.
    private double
    interestRate
    The interest rate for a savings account, expressed as percentage points, e.g., 3.0 for a 3% interest rate.
    private static int
    lastAccNum
    The last assigned account number.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BankAccount()
    Creates a new instance of BankAccount and increments the lastAccNum.

    Creates a new instance of BankAccount with the specified parameters and increments the lastAccNum.

  • Constructor Details

    • BankAccount

      public BankAccount()
      Creates a new instance of BankAccount and increments the lastAccNum.

    • BankAccount

      public BankAccount(double balance, String accName, char accountType)
      Creates a new instance of BankAccount with the specified parameters and increments the lastAccNum.
      Parameters:
      balance - the starting balance of the account
      accName - the account name
      accountType - the account type

  • Method Details

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double amount)
      Withdraws the specified amount from the bank account.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to withdraw.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the account has insufficient funds

    • deposit

      public void deposit(double amount)
      Deposits the specified amount from the bank account.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to deposit.

    • displayAccountInfo

      public void displayAccountInfo()
      Prints the account information to the console.

    • addInterest

      public void addInterest()
      Adds interest to the account balance. Only savings accounts bear interest.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the account type is not 'S'

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance()
      Returns the balance of the account..
      Returns:
      the account balance

    • setBalance

      public void setBalance(double balance)
      Sets the balance of the account.
      Parameters:
      balance - the new balance

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the account name.
      Returns:
      the name of the account

    • setName

      public void setName(String accName)
      Sets the name of the account.
      Parameters:
      accName - the new name

    • getAccountType

      public char getAccountType()
      Returns the account type.
      Returns:
      the type of the account

    • setAccountType

      public void setAccountType(char accountType)
      Sets the account type. Only 'S' for savings and 'C' for checking are allowed.
      Parameters:
      accountType - the new account type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the account type is invalid

    • getInterestRate

      public double getInterestRate()
      Returns the interest rate of the account.
      Returns:
      the interest rate

    • setInterestRate

      public void setInterestRate(double interestRate)
      Sets the interest rate of the account.
      Parameters:
      interestRate - the new interest rate

    • transfer

      public static void transfer(BankAccount fromAccount, BankAccount toAccount, double amount)
      Performs a transfer of funds from one account to another.
      Parameters:
      fromAccount - the account to transfer funds from
      toAccount - the account to transfer funds to
      amount - the amount to transfer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the fromAccount has insufficient funds
